title: Kevin Wood - Kindred 2008
description:
Kevin Wood - Kindred 2008
# Original Release Date: April 8, 2008
# Label: New Vision Music
# Copyright: (C) 2008 New Vision Music
Rip 320kbs

Kindred is the third CD by Kevin Wood that I&#039;ve purchased and they seem to get better with each new release.
Though different from Sacred, the pieces on Kindred are just as thought provoking and ethereal as his other compositions.
It isn&#039;t too difficult for me to sense his warmth and depth of soul to be able to please our ears the way his music does.
And isn&#039;t that what we all want.....to be treated to sounds that warm our heart and soul! Thank you, Kevin, and please carry on with more.
This one&#039;s a keeper....

Tracklist:
1. Adoration	 	
2. Strength in Numbers	
3. Mother&#039;s Love	
4. The Eternal Return		
5. Honoring Tradition		
6. Many Voices, One Spirit		
7. Atonement	
8. Reunion	
9. The Eternal Return (Ambient Mix)		
10. Many Voices, One Spirit (Meditation Mix)	
11. In Search of Kindred Spirits [Bonus Track]

Enjoy It!!
Ulysses56
